mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_INCOMESTATEMENT0M (INCOMESTATEMENTPA2007SGMTSEQNO, REVENUEOFSALES, COSTOFSALES, BUSINESSANDOTHERTAXES, SELLINGEXPENSES, GENERALANDADMINISTRATIVEEXPENS, FINANCIALEXPENSE, IMPAIRMENTLOSSOFASSETS, PROORLOSARIFROCHAINFAIVAL, INVESTMENTINCOME, INVFROAFFBUSANDCOOENT, OPERATINGPROFITS, NONOPERATINGINCOME, NONOPERATINGEXPENSES, NONCURRENTASSETS, PROFITBEFORETAX, INCOMETAXEXPENSE, NETPROFIT, BASICEARNINGSPERSHARE, DILUTEDEARNINGSPERSHARE,REPORTFLAG,etl_date ) select INCOMESTATEMENTPA2007SGMTSEQNO, REVENUEOFSALES, COSTOFSALES, BUSINESSANDOTHERTAXES, SELLINGEXPENSES, GENERALANDADMINISTRATIVEEXPENS, FINANCIALEXPENSE, IMPAIRMENTLOSSOFASSETS, PROORLOSARIFROCHAINFAIVAL, INVESTMENTINCOME, INVFROAFFBUSANDCOOENT, OPERATINGPROFITS, NONOPERATINGINCOME, NONOPERATINGEXPENSES, NONCURRENTASSETS, PROFITBEFORETAX, INCOMETAXEXPENSE, NETPROFIT, BASICEARNINGSPERSHARE, DILUTEDEARNINGSPERSHARE,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_INCOMESTATEMENT07 where INCOMESTATEMENTPA2007SGMTSEQNO = #{IncomeStatementPA2007SgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
